author: kpedro88
body: Following discussion in the Core Software meeting (https://indico.cern.ch/event/1282062/) and at https://gist.github.com/kpedro88/39024c924d39ec1d65eddb9f5619d723, the script `scram-venv` is provided as a common tool for users to be able to install Python packages in their local CMSSW areas using the venv specification.
title: script to set up venv in CMS environment
